attributes.action: Make Simon 'Chip' Comins the New Prime Minister !!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After the years of great service and unbiased advice covering every aspect of daily life on Passionford.com 

He surely has to be a contender for Prime Minister !!!! 

The man is a legend and there is nothing he does not know.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
